posts.post_content: Pose 485-4, card has been loved. $100 or best offer
Why did you write the price on the card (twice)?
It's on there three times if you look close, which means I originally wanted $300 for it. I was willing to cut into into three sections and sell it, each section for $100

[quote name="oldjudge" post=1324560]Why did you write the price on the card (twice)?[/QUOTE]

LOL, good one Jay!

[quote name="rhettyeakley" post=1324757]LOL, good one Jay![/QUOTE]

Your credit is misguided. I put the price at $100 because it was written there, but put the best offer to be more realistic. He also missed the third time it's written on the card. :)
Forgot I still had this card. Special today, $55 dlvd :)
